text: Otakar Brousek (28 September 1924 - 14 March 2014) was a Czech actor and voice actor. He appeared in the movies Andělská tvář (2002), Svatby pana Voka (1971), and Můj brácha má prima bráchu (1975). He also appeared in the television show F. L. Věk in 1971. He was born in Krhanice, Czechoslovakia. Brousek died on 14 March 2014 in Prague, Czech Republic. He was 89 years old. He was outlived by his children, actors Otakar Brousek, Jr. and Jaroslava Brousková. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech stage actors Category:Czech television actors Category:Voice actors
title: Otakar Brousek, Sr.
